page.title: 17Introduction (part 2)
page.content: The tower was completed in 1982 and stands 76 meteres high. Top scientists from all parts of the world visit the site to use some of the best nuclear facilities in the world. The area is well served with a good network of main roads and motorways which fortunately have left Daresbury village unaltered. There are good railway facilities both at Runcorn and Warrington and Liverpool and Manchester Airports are less than 30 minutes drive away. About a mile away there are industrial estates including a science park.
